title: New Razer Blade Stealth - Huge CPU Upgrade!
description: Dave2D review of the new 13.3" Razer Blade Stealth. Their best laptop for students and professionals who need portability. Razer Stealth -  Skins from -   Razer Core -  Razer Core Benchmarking -   The new thin and light ultrabook with the Quad Core 8th gen Kaby Lake R CPU. This thing is way faster versus the 7th gen CPU for multi-core applications and gaming with the Razer Core.
